description: Concatenation of all numbers less than or equal to n other than the phi(n) numbers relatively prime to n.
comments: a(1) = 1 as the number itself is to be included. a(p) = p if p is a prime (by definition).
example: a(6) = 2346, as 2,3,4,6 are not coprime to 6 and 1 and 5 are coprime to 6.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 19 2001
